name: The Elder Scrolls Renewal: Skyblivion (TES Renewal)
name_original: The Elder Scrolls Renewal: Skyblivion (TES Renewal)
description: Skyblivion is a volunteer-based project by the TESRenewal modding group. We aim to bring the Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion to a new generation of gamers and re-introduce it to long time fans of the series. We are currently in the process of porting and rebuilding Cyrodiil along with all of its quests, locations and characters into Skyrim and Skyrim: Special Edition.
